todolist.title: Complete Project Proposal
todolist.description: Draft and finalize the project proposal document.

todolist.title: Team Meeting
todolist.description: Discuss progress and assign tasks for the upcoming sprint.

todolist.title: Code Review
todolist.description: Review the latest commits and provide feedback.

todolist.title: Deploy API Update
todolist.description: Deploy the latest version of the API with new features and fixes.

todolist.title: Prepare Presentation
todolist.description: Create slides and rehearse for the upcoming project presentation.
